it.polimi.se2018.view

Class ViewCLI

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • it.polimi.se2018.view.ViewCLI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ViewCLIInterface, java.util.Observer

    public class ViewCLI
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.util.Observer, ViewCLIInterface
    This class prints in the command line anything that can be visualized by the players.
    Author:
    fabio
